price: Dájúdájú àwọn tó ń yapa Allāhu àti Òjíṣẹ́ Rẹ̀, àwọn wọ̀nyẹn wà nínú àwọn olùyẹpẹrẹ jùlọ.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡأَذَلِّينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yuḥāddūna al-laha warasūlahu ulāika fī al-adhalīna
